alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Issaquena; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 9:55AM CDT until May 25 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Eastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Central Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Southeastern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 955 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Newellton to 7 miles northwest of Port Gibson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Afton around 1000 AM CDT. Vicksburg, Le Tourneau and Yokena around 1010 AM CDT. Bovina around 1025 AM CDT. Redwood and Flowers around 1030 AM CDT. Oak Ridge and Youngton around 1035 AM CDT. Valley Park around 1040 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mound, Delta and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
